__e: A few months ago he told me that all I brought back from the island was pain, misery, and darkness.
I'd like to remind everyone who might be paying attention that I rescued your husband and all the rest of you from a life of misery and imprisonment.
It has brought me and everyone around me nothing but misery and death.
Not good at all. This country is now good for nothing.
And then we just hope that something shitty happens in the world and bumps us from the news cycle.
I've had a lot of bad in my life. I was hoping for a little slice of something good.
